puzzles.author: Jane Austen
puzzles.text: Ug ur e gvigb idumovresst epndalsohcoh, gbeg e rudcso wed ud farrorruad ay e caah yavgido, wirg ko ud ledg ay e luyo.

puzzles.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
puzzles.text: I vuyik et remo i hoi nil; sua kobow mkuv guv thwukl eh et akher eh't ek guh vihow.

puzzles.author: Irina Dunn
puzzles.text: I meliy mufneof i liy ub huta i subn mufneof i kuwcwha.

puzzles.author: George Carlin
puzzles.text: Sae vcay kti widk ktucp owaek cibfanturuo? Sae lac'k tohi ka wfucp grayifd. Siot, edeorrs ktis'fi orfiols ktifi. Udc'k ktok cubi? Uk'd cubi. Uk'd bachicuick.

puzzles.author: Albert Einstein
puzzles.text: Sredc isaceadfa mi uomniteml eh mna btaumahm adayl ig mtomn.

puzzles.author: George Orwell
puzzles.text: Us pfoyo yoerrn uh hilf e pfumt eh piymumt um amo'h tyexo, Hfevohgoeyo cihp top e rap as okoyluho.

puzzles.author: Mitch Hedberg
puzzles.text: E velp o payw'c ikeleil iv fu ec muns fayr elvbaulyup imun hrudrun in lid E romu tnuop.

puzzles.author: Ernest Hemingway
puzzles.text: El gr Finuyweyu rao may'w su, E'nn tiyc grvunl ay raoh Bthevwgiv whuu.
